showerReviews.reviewText: … impressive and always clean. but lugging my own sweat drenched towel around all day (which i also had to use as a shower towel; because who’s bringing 2 towels everyday to the gym?) is often a de-motivator to go work out. it’s just …

… spot for water aerobics and love each instructor. It is convient location near by. The employees very friendly and respectful.  I would suggest to update the women's bathrooms/ shower rooms kind of run down. Overall this is my happy place

The womans locker rooms are dirty at night the pool drain grate is missing which if someone were to get their foot caught they'd at least fall if not into the pool pluss they let the homeless shower in the facility

showerReviews.reviewText: … Almost no one takes a shower before swimming. Although a sign with such a requirement hangs in front of the entrance to the pool. I don't understand, is it ignorance, lack of culture, or careless attitude towards themselves and others? Even …
Great classes. My 6 year old is enjoying the swimming lessons. Pool water is cooler than some other places. Bring your own shower gel.
I swam laps there tonight for the first time. It is a nice facility. The shower and locker rooms AR not being used right now due to Colvin.
$3 per 2 hrs swimming ... pool well maintained. Hot shower n children park available.

showerReviews.reviewText: Super cute park in adorable little neighborhood with playground, water fountain for playing in, picnic tables and basketball court. Unfortunately the bathrooms were locked and only a portable toilet was available for doing your business. I would still recommend it.

Nice city park. Quiet, well manicured and clean. I was just passing through didn't get to interact with staff. Clean restrooms. Felt safe and relaxing. If I had the time, I could sit back and people watch, enjoy flowers and trees or just catch up on some reading.

This a a quant little park new sales in the center of a small neighborhood. There is an outdoor playground and a nice basketball court. There are public restrooms and a walking path all the way around the small park. Plenty of room to play …

Great Small park. Packed with activities. Basketball goal, tennis, courts, spray park and lots of playground equipment, including a merry ground and swings. Restrooms are on site.They were stocked with toilet paper and soap. Several picnic tables and benches, including a barbecue.

this park is super neat and clean!  ideal for young and old as sometimes there is a group playing live music!  very talented musicians who give us a little bit of diatraction at random chaos!  Clean bathrooms and you can have picnics as there are tables and chairs!
